channel.title: Sequencing Data on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in Sequencing Data on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Foundations of Genomic Data – Post 12: ShortRead
item.description: Discover how ShortRead serves as the crucial starting point for genomic data analysis, providing comprehensive tools for importing, assessing, and preprocessing raw sequencing reads before they flow into the structured Bioconductor analysis pipeline.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 7: Understanding FASTQ vs. FASTA Files
item.description: Learn the key differences between FASTQ and FASTA files in RNA-Seq analysis, from raw reads to reference sequences. Understand their roles in quality control, alignment, and data preprocessing.
